updateElements.mainContentHeader: Your Mac will restart during this update
updateElements.mainContentSubHeader: Updates can take up to 30 minutes to complete
updateElements.mainContentText:
This is a friendly reminder from Lucas.

Updating protects your Mac from known security vulnerabilities!

Waiting until the update deadline might cause an inconvenient interruption!

You can always install updates yourself in System Settings.
updateElements.mainHeader: Your Mac requires a security update
